radiographic_examinations.findings: A new, moderate right pleural effusion with adjacent atelectasis, atelectasis within the anterior right middle lobe and left lower lobe, enlarged and inflamed appendix with foci of adjacent gas, a small adjacent rim-enhancing fluid collection compatible with an abscess, and multiple prominent mediastinal and retroperitoneal lymph nodes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The abscess is smaller in comparison to the previous examination but more organized; multiple contiguous loops of small bowel are increased in diameter compared to the previous study.
